name: inexus
description: Integration of GPT, Gemini dialogue api, an interface to achieve cross-platform interface calls, perfect support for tools

scripts.clean: rm -rf index.js && rm -rf $(find inexus -iname '*.js') && rm -rf $(find tests -iname '*.js')
scripts.clean:d: rm -rf index.d.ts && rm -rf $(find inexus -iname '*.d.ts') && rm -rf $(find tests -iname '*.d.ts')

author: Renew
